channel.title: XBox 360 LIVE NAT setting changed
channel.description: My NAT was normally moderate and i could do everything fine except connect to a few people, but i could connect to all my friends. It recently started appearing as 'Open', i know this is supposedly good, but not for me. Now none of my friends can connect to me, i cant connect to anyone. Im using a linksys WRT54GS and there is no guide on how to change your NAT back and forth from strict, moderate, and open, just a guide for getting it to open.

item.title: XBox 360 LIVE NAT setting changed
item.dc:creator: @Payback_Is_A_Bitch Payback Is A Bitch
item.description:
@Payback_Is_A_Bitch wrote:

I had the same problem with the Linksys BEFSR41 router, I got a simple $10 router that doesnt have port forwarding or any of that shit and works perfect.

Edit:
but on the other hand I’ve always had a problem with Linksys routers with my modem (my modem also has a page you have to portforward even though its 1 port)

Read full topic

item.title: XBox 360 LIVE NAT setting changed
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

I really dont want to do anything like that at first, because all we changed was the network name, and since i hook my xbox to my laptop to get LIVE that wouldnt effect it unless the laptop doesnt have the updated name, which it does.

Read full topic

item.title: XBox 360 LIVE NAT setting changed
item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323
item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

your router is supported

http://www.xbox.com/en-US/support/connecttolive/xbox360/homenetworking/equipment.htm

update your firmware?

Read full topic
